name: muenster
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mild (= not strong), medium-soft, American cow's milk cheese, usually pale yellow with a thin orange outside layer: Top with a cheese that melts easily such as Muenster. a tablespoon of grated Muenster cheese Burger toppings include blue cheese dressing and muenster cheese.
More examplesFewer examplesI used to always eat Muenster instead of American on sandwiches growing up.It's a toasted pita bread filled with grilled chicken and melted Muenster cheese, served with tomatoes, cucumbers, salsa and sour cream.
